function ERI_EP05_13()
    --.転-5【2月第3週】「私のファンたち総力を上げて潰すが」
    SaveData.Title = "私のファンたち総力を上げて潰すが"

    --//BG：男子部教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒×MAX
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[Two weeks remaining until the Princess Election――the appeal activities were reaching their climax.
姫皇選挙まで残り２週間――アピールも大詰めを迎えようとしていた頃。]])

    MSG([[Our Erika faction had finally grown strong enough to rival Hermes’ faction.
とうとうボクらエリカ派の勢力は、エルメスさんの派閥に届きうるほどに成長していた。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：リラ（通常）、アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,900,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,250,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,700,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0574.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Hey hey, GGY<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I dragged Akira out of her house~"
「やぁやぁ、ＧＧＹ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　アキラを家から連れ出してきたよ～」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,250,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0575.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "—What’s with this crowd!?"
「――って何この人数！？」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,30,10,1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0770.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Ah, ahababa... m-my chronic human allergy..."
「あば、あばばばば……じ、持病の人間アレルギーが……」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1268.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Akira, please keep your composure! It’s okay, I’m here with you!"
「あ、アキラ、気をしっかりもって！　大丈夫、ボクがついてるよ！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：リラ（通常）、アキラ（通常）、ウラン（笑顔）、ダリア（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_DAR01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0378.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "When we announced the Erika faction’s social gathering, this many people showed up."
「エリカさんの派閥の懇親会を開くと告知したら、この人数になったのですわ」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0305.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "And even now, there’s still not enough room. Ouga and Hiyu are preparing the adjacent classroom as a venue."
「これでもまだ全然入り切らないから、隣の教室もオウガくんやヒユくんたちが会場として準備中だよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0306.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "Thanks to Erika’s efforts and Akira’s schemes. Quite a remarkable achievement."
「エリカくんの努力と、アキラくんの策略のおかげだね。素晴らしい成果じゃないか」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01ha")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0771.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "I-I’m just... not really..."
「わ、私は……別に……」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,250,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0576.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Don’t be modest. Honestly, every strategy Akira came up with has worked out well."
「謙遜しないの。実際、アキラの考えた作戦はどれも上手くいってるんだし」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,250,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0577.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "I know~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> You made multiple fake accounts and were sneaking around spreading rumors on social media, right?"
「知ってるよ～<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　アンタ、架空のアカウントいくつも作って、ＳＮＳでもコソコソとウワサを広げてたっしょ？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0772.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Ugh... How did you know that?"
「うぅ……なんで、それを」]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0578.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Well, the quality was so high no one else caught on. You’re quite the operative."
「ま、アタシ以外にはバレないクオリティの高さだけどね。大した工作員っぷりじゃん」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1269.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "I don’t think I could have regained trust in such a short time using just the straightforward approach."
「正攻法だけじゃ、きっとこの僅かな期間で信頼を取り戻すことはできなかったと思う」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1270.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "I really felt anew that I’ve been able to carry on as a ‘princess’ thanks to Akira. Truly, thank you, Akira."
「ここまで『姫』として活動してこられたのはアキラのおかげだって、改めて感じたよ。本当にありがとう、アキラ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0773.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "I-I just... wanted to be a support for Minachin."
「わ、私は、ただ……ミナちんのチカラになりたかっただけで」]])

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

STOP_BGM(1000)

    MSG([[Suddenly, a shrill scream echoed from the entrance of the classroom.
突如、教室の入り口から黄色い悲鳴が響いた。]])

    MSG([[At the same moment I turned my gaze toward the source of the scream, a chill ran down my spine.
悲鳴のした方へ視線を向けると同時に、ボクの背筋は凍りつく。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0307.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "You... why are you here!"
「オマエが……どうしてここに！」]])

    STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "Oh my, I’m the board director of this academy, you know? It’s not strange for me to be here, is it?"
「あらあら、私はこの学園の理事よォ？　別にいてもおかしくはないでしょ～？」]])

    MSG([[There stood Nemesia Himegami.
そこにいたのは姫神ネメシア。]])

    MSG([[The one who exposed my true gender at the end of last year, plunging me into utter despair, and the culprit who cornered my sister Marika.
昨年末にボクの性別を暴き、絶望のドン底に突き落とした相手であり、マリカ姉さんを追い詰めた犯人。]])

    MSG([[She was truly the root cause of all the turmoil over the past year.
この一年間の騒動の、すべての元凶とも言うべき相手であった。]])

    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）、ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "More than that... isn’t it a problem that someone like you—also a member of the Himegami family—is attending this gathering?"
「それよりも……姫神家の一員でもあるアナタがこの会合に参加してる方が問題だと思うけれどねェ？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0308.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "I settled things with Erika in the Princess Election. I can’t betray Marika or Yuriai Academy any further."
「エリカくんとの姫選挙でケジメはつけたはずだ。
    　これ以上、もう私はマリカを……百合愛学園を裏切れない」]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0309.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "Even if it means opposing Hermes."
「たとえ、エルメスと敵対することになってもな」]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0344.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
 "Ehhhh!? Daria-chan is also joining Erika-chan’s faction!?"
「え～～～！？　ダリアちゃんもエリカちゃん派に回るの～～～！？」]])

    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）、エルメス（驚き）、ダリア（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ca")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,950,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,750,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)


PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0310.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "H-Hermes?"
「え、エルメス」]])

    MSG([[After Nemesia Himegami, Hermes also entered the classroom.
姫神ネメシアに続いてエルメスさんも教室に入ってきた。]])

    MSG([[Even though we were right deep in enemy territory, her demeanor was no different than usual.
敵陣の真っ只中だというのに、その様子は普段と何ら変わらない。]])

    MSG([[With her usual carefree air, she casually walked right up to Daria.
普段の脳天気な様子で、テクテクとダリアさんの目の前まで歩いてくる。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_ERU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0345.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
 "We promised to fulfill Mother’s dream together, right? Right, right? Hey hey, let’s aim for co-ed school together~! Please please!"
「お母さまの夢を一緒に叶える約束でしょ？　でしょでしょ？　ねぇねぇ、一緒に共学を目指そうよ～！　お願いお願～い！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0346.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
 "Everyone else too! Please! I’ll definitely make this a fun co-ed school!"
「他のみんなも！　お願いだよ～！　ぜ～～～～～ったい共学で楽しい学園にしてみせるから！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0347.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
 "Come aim for co-ed school with me~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Okay<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Okay<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"
「私と一緒に共学を目指そうよ～～<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">　ね<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">　ね<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">」]])

    MSG([[Hermes looked at us with sparkling eyes, begging earnestly.
キラキラした目をボクらに向けて、おねだりをするエルメスさん。]])

    MSG([[Just that alone made my chest tighten painfully, and I was tormented by guilt.
ただそれだけで、胸が締めつけられるように痛み、罪悪感に苛まされてしまう。]])

    MSG([[Being asked so straightforwardly by the well-meaning Hermes was far crueler than being forced to join by brute force.
悪意がないエルメスさんの真っ直ぐな言葉でお願いされるのは、力づくで仲間になるよう迫られるよりも、ずっと凶悪だ。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒×MAX
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0148.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
 "H-Hermes-sama..."
「え、エルメス様……」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
 "If Hermes-sama looks at me like that... I..."
「エルメス様にあんな顔をされたら……私」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
 "Ugh... what on earth should I do...?"
「うう……い、一体どうすればいいんですの……」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[In fact, some knights were beginning to waver.
実際、騎士の皆さんの中にも迷いが生じ始めていた。]])

    MSG([[Caught off guard and struck by Hermes’ charm, it’s natural for anyone’s heart to waver.
虚をつかれた状態で、エルメスさんの魅力に当てられれば、誰だって心が揺らいで当然だ。]])

    MSG([[On top of that, in such a densely packed classroom, escaping was difficult. Ordering everyone to leave could cause a panic.
その上、これほどヒトの密集した教室では逃げることも困難。下手にみんなに教室から出るよう命じたら、パニックだって起こり得る。]])

    MSG([[This wasn’t a random raid but a calculated move to completely crush our Erika faction.
思いつきの奇襲ではなく、完全にボクたちエリカ派を潰すための、計算尽くの一手だった。]])

    --//BU：ネメシア（通常）、ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0311.wav")
    MSG([[
【Daria】
 "...How dirty can you be? To make Hermes act this despicably."
「……どこまで汚いんだ、オマエは。エルメスにこんな卑劣な役回りをさせるなんて」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "Oh my<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Hermes is just sincerely asking~ Where’s the dirtiness in that, I wonder?"
「あ～ら<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　エルメスは純粋にお願いしてるだけじゃなァ～い？　一体どこが汚いというのかしらァ？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "Now, Hermes. Make these kids even happier."
「さぁ、エルメス。この子たちをもっと喜ばせてあげなさい」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "I’m sure if everyone hears your cute song, they’ll smile and change their minds<sprite="Emoji" name="star">"
「きっとみんな、アナタの可愛い歌を聞けば、笑顔で心変わりをしてくれるわよォ<sprite="Emoji" name="star">」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0348.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
 "Okaaay<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Got it, Mother!"
「はぁ～～～い<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">　わかったよ、お母さま！」]])

    MSG([[Hermes lightly hopped onto the center of the teacher’s podium with a twirl.
エルメスさんがくるりくるりと軽やかなステップで、教壇の中央へ跳び乗った。]])

    MSG([[Then, from somewhere, background music began playing.
そしてどこからともなくＢＧＭが流れ出す。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1271.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Our support rate was finally recovering, but if this continues, everything will be ruined...!"
「やっと支持率が回復してきたのに、このままだとめちゃくちゃだ…！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1272.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "We have to do something... But how?"
「何とかしないと……でも、どうやって」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0774.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
 "That’s enough."
「そこまでです」]])
    -- //アキラ

    MSG([[At that moment, a student stepped forward in front of Hermes.
その時、エルメスさんの前に一人の生徒が歩み出てきた。]])

    --//BU：アキラ（真剣）、エルメス（驚き）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[It was Akira. Though she’s usually the worst at being in front of people, she advanced to the podium, receiving everyone’s full attention.
なんと、それはアキラ。 人前に立つことが何よりの苦手なはずの彼女が、みんなの視線を一身に受けながら、教壇へと進んでいく。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1273.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "A-Akira!? What do you plan to do!?"
「あ、アキラ！？　どうするつもり！？」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0775.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Just watch quietly. I’ll send these people away."
「黙って見ててください。このヒトたちは、私が追い返します」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（真剣）、エルメス（驚き）、ネメシア（嘲笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "Send them away~? A stinky little girl like you~~~?"
「追い返すですってェ～？　アナタみたいな、芋臭い小娘がァ～～～？」]])

    MSG([[Nemesia Himegami stepped up to block Akira’s way.
アキラの行く手を阻むように、姫神ネメシアが立ちはだかった。]])

    MSG([[She provocatively brought her face close to Akira’s nose.
ネメシアは挑発するように、アキラの鼻先へと自らの顔を寄せる。]])

    MSG([[Like a snake preparing to swallow a frog. Even we watching shuddered at the sight.
まるで、蛙を飲み込まんとする蛇。
    　見ているコチラまで肝が冷える光景だ。]])

    MSG([[Indeed, Akira’s legs trembled slightly.
実際、アキラの足はわずかに震えていた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0030.wav")
